content: You haven't told me your favorite color yet [M8, M9]. Please share it with me, and I'll remember it for future conversations. You can also choose a common pick like blue, green, black, purple, red, or orange [M4], or be specific with a hex code if you're picky [M10].

I've got it! Your favorite color is indeed blue. I'll default to that for our conversations from now on [M1, M3, M9]. If you want a specific shade (e.g., navy, royal, sky), feel free to let me know and I'll use it going forward [M14, M30].
You've told me before that your favorite cryptocurrency is Monero (XMR).
Okay, what about my third favorite?
Your third favorite cryptocurrency is Stellar (XLM) [M3, M4].
According to our previous conversation, your second favorite cryptocurrency is Bitcoin (BTC) [M4].
